title: Classified Powershift hub goes 12 speed for SRAM 2×12 gearing without a front derailleur
content:
Classified’s wireless electronic internal gear 2-speed Powershift rear hub makes the leap to 12 speeds with the addition of four new tightly-spaced SRAM-ready cassettes. Delivering all of the aero, straight chainline benefits of a 1x setup with the wide range and small gearing steps of a traditional road 2x drivetrain, the Classified Powershift system can […]

The post Classified Powershift hub goes 12 speed for SRAM 2×12 gearing without a front derailleur appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
